mapper.sql: id, xh, xm, kch, kcm, xf, max_score, if_make_up, if_pay, jxjhh
mapper.delete:
delete from MAKUP makeup where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select from MAKUP makeup where id = #{id}

SELECT BKKCXXB.jxjhh as jxjhh, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh AS xh, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm AS xm, BKKCXXB.kch AS kch, BKKCXXB.kcm AS kcm, BKKCXXB.xf, XS_CJ_MAX.ZGCJ AS maxScore, 0 as ifMakeUp, 0 as ifPay FROM XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW LEFT JOIN XS_CJ_MAX ON XS_CJ_MAX.xh = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh LEFT JOIN BKKCXXB ON BKKCXXB.kch = XS_CJ_MAX.kch where BKKCXXB.sfzzbk = '是' and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh = #{xh} and XS_CJ_MAX.ZGCJ <= #{bkfs} and BKKCXXB.Jxjhh = #{zxjxjhh} and BKKCXXB.kch not in (select kch from MAKUP where if_make_up = 1 and JXJHH = #{zxjxjhh} and xh = #{xh}) UNION SELECT BKKCXXB.jxjhh as jxjhh, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh AS xh, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm AS xm, JH_KCTDB_VIEW.btdkch AS kch, BKKCXXB.kcm AS kcm, BKKCXXB.xf, XS_CJ_MAX.ZGCJ AS maxScore, 0 as ifMakeUp, 0 as ifPay FROM XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW LEFT JOIN XS_CJ_MAX ON XS_CJ_MAX.xh = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh LEFT JOIN JH_KCTDB_VIEW ON JH_KCTDB_VIEW.BTDKCH = XS_CJ_MAX.kch and JH_KCTDB_VIEW.Zxjxjhh = #{zxjxjhh} LEFT JOIN BKKCXXB ON BKKCXXB.kch = JH_KCTDB_VIEW.tdkch WHERE BKKCXXB.sfzzbk = '是' and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh = #{xh} and XS_CJ_MAX.ZGCJ <= #{bkfs} and BKKCXXB.Jxjhh = #{zxjxjhh} and BKKCXXB.kch not in (select kch from MAKUP where if_make_up = 1 and JXJHH = #{zxjxjhh} and xh = #{xh})

select MAKUP.xh as xh, MAKUP.xm as xm, MAKUP.kch as kch, MAKUP.kcm as kcm, MAKUP.xf as xf, MAKUP.max_score as maxScore, CODE_ZXJXJHXNXQXX.zxjxjhm as zxjxjhm, CASE MAKUP.if_pay WHEN 0 THEN '未缴费' WHEN 1 THEN '已缴费' ELSE '错误' END AS IFPAY from MAKUP LEFT JOIN CODE_ZXJXJHXNXQXX ON CODE_ZXJXJHXNXQXX.ZXJXJHH = MAKUP.JXJHH where MAKUP.JXJHH = #{zxjxjhh} and MAKUP.if_make_up = 1

SELECT MAKUP.kch AS KCH, MAKUP.kcm AS KCM, MAKUP.xf AS XF, MAKUP.MAX_SCORE AS MAXSCORE, CASE MAKUP.if_pay WHEN 0 THEN '未缴费' WHEN 1 THEN '已缴费' ELSE '错误' END AS IFPAY FROM MAKUP WHERE MAKUP.if_make_up = 1 AND MAKUP.if_pay = 1 AND MAKUP.xh = #{xh}

SELECT DISTINCT makup.id as makupId, code_zxjxjhxnxqxx.zxjxjhm as zxjxjhm, cj_all_kw_view.xh as xh, cj_all_kw_view.kch as kch, cj_all_kw_view.kxh as kxh, cj_all_kw_view.kcm as kcm, cj_all_kw_view.kccj as kccj, cj_all_kw_view.xf as xf, cj_all_kw_view.xs as xs, cj_all_kw_view.kcsxmc as kcsxmc, cj_all_kw_view.kslxmc as kslxmc, case makup.if_make_up when 1 then '已报名' when 0 then '未报名' else '未报名' end as ifMakeUpName, makup.if_make_up as ifMakeUp FROM makup inner join cj_all_kw_view on cj_all_kw_view.xh = makup.xh and cj_all_kw_view.kccj = makup.max_score and cj_all_kw_view.kch = makup.kch inner join code_zxjxjhxnxqxx on code_zxjxjhxnxqxx.zxjxjhh = makup.jxjhh WHERE makup.xh = #{xh} ORDER BY ifMakeUpName desc

SELECT MAKUP.kch AS KCH, MAKUP.kcm AS KCM, MAKUP.xf AS XF, MAKUP.MAX_SCORE AS MAXSCORE, CASE MAKUP.if_pay WHEN 0 THEN '未缴费' WHEN 1 THEN '已缴费' ELSE '错误' END AS IFPAY FROM MAKUP WHERE MAKUP.if_make_up = 1 AND MAKUP.xh = #{xh}

SELECT DISTINCT cj_all_kw_view.kch as kch, cj_all_kw_view.kcm as kcm, cj_all_kw_view.xf as xf, xs_cj_max.zgcj as maxScore FROM xs_cj_max inner join cj_all_kw_view on cj_all_kw_view.xh = xs_cj_max.xh and cj_all_kw_view.kccj = xs_cj_max.zgcj and cj_all_kw_view.kch = xs_cj_max.kch WHERE xs_cj_max.xh = #{xh} and xs_cj_max.zgcj < #{bkfs} and cj_all_kw_view.kch not in( select kch from makup where makup.xh = #{xh} )
mapper.insert:
insert into MAKUP
id,
xh,
xm,
kch,
kcm,
xf,
max_score,
if_make_up,
if_pay,
jxjhh
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{kch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{kcm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{maxScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ifMakeUp,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{ifPay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{jxjhh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update MAKUP makeup
xh = #{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xm = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kch = #{kch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kcm = #{kcm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xf = #{xf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
max_score = #{maxScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
if_make_up = #{ifMakeUp,jdbcType=TINYINTDECIMAL},
if_pay = #{ifPay,jdbcType=TINYINTDECIMAL}
where id= #{id}
update MAKUP makeup set deleted=1 where id=#{id}
update MAKUP makeup set deleted=1 where id=#{id}
